tool.name: tool_21

param.name: COUNT
param.dialogReference:
Number of Categories

Grid, output, optional

optional

number of different categories (unique values) within search area

param.name: KERNEL_TYPE
param.dialogReference:
Kernel Type

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Square

[1] Circle

Default: 1

The kernel's shape.

tool.summary: Grid based analysis of diversity with Rao's Q Index. Rao's Q diversity index is calculated locally for each grid cell using the specified kernel (aka 'moving window'). It is assumed that the grid cell values represent quantities.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
